text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ewwies～… Why'd I forget to clean～！

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It's so easy to chill to the max when I'm alone～…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I have to do something before the cutie juniors come over tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Time to evacuate this mess on the floor into a closet! Yep!
